name: 資優教育概論
goals: 認識與瞭解智能與資優的意涵
認識與瞭解資優教育的鑑定、課程設計、教學與資優方案
培養對資優教育實務與研究的態度與知能
syllabus:
【16+2 Weeks】  
W1: Overview of the course  
W2~3: Foundation and myth of gifted education  
W4~5: Nature & Needs of the Gifted Characteristics  
            Definition of Giftedness & Methods of Identification  
W6: Curriculum Approaches in Gifted Education: Enrichment  
W7: Curriculum Approaches in Gifted Education: Enrichment  
W8: Midterm evaluation and discussion  
W9: Gifted education programming and implementation  
W10: Curriculum Approaches in Gifted Education: Differentiation  
W11: Curriculum Approaches in Gifted Education: Creativity and leadership  
W12: The Learning Environment at Home: Parents and Families  
W13: Policy in Gifted Education  
W14: University-based gifted program for talent development  
W15: Meeting the Needs of Students Who Are Twice-Exceptional or Culturally Diverse  
W16: Application of Learning Through Product Development

methodologies.note: The instructor would give short lecture on topics listed above.
The students would work collaboratively in group on reading assignment and discussion.
The students would work in group or individuality on research topics and compose a project.

grading.note: Introduce a G/T center website connecting to the chapter, and try to contact the website for the issues that your group is interested in.
Represent the knowledge gained from investigating an interested topic and present it to the class in a creative poster session format (the story of the investigation, findings, and references).

prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
